company-details: We are coming up with a 360-degree connection for every entity small or large involved in the heavy equipment industry. From manufacturers to dealers, from the pain of finding operators to maintenance, from worry to rent equipment to sell equipment, from going through thousands of quotes to reaching out to multiple financers, we are trying to bring the entire heavy equipment industry on one single platform.
job-description: Design highly scalable & testable code
Work on Silios (independently)
Work on components, contexts, navigation, HOC, etc.
Convert our new business ideas into code using React Native
Work on developing high-quality applications
Work on designing and implementing testable and scalable code
